SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND (t.jzmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%') OR t.jzwz LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%'))

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL t_cgl ON t.jzid = t_cgl.jzid AND t_cgl.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND (t.jzmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%') OR t.jzwz LIKE concat(concat('%',#{jzmc}),'%'))
AND t.jzlx = #{jzlx}
